trans-unit.source: Represents a continuation token for listing operations.
trans-unit.target: Represents a continuation token for listing operations.

trans-unit.source: <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobContinuationToken</codeEntityReference> continuation tokens are used in methods that return a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobResultSegment</codeEntityReference> object, such as <codeEntityReference>!:CloudBlobDirectory.ListBlobsSegmented(BlobContinuationToken)</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobContinuationToken</codeEntityReference> continuation tokens are used in methods that return a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobResultSegment</codeEntityReference> object, such as <codeEntityReference>!:CloudBlobDirectory.ListBlobsSegmented(BlobContinuationToken)</codeEntityReference>.
